1553.content:
The winter wind blew against his scales, chilling the drake to the bone. His head percked up, spotting hazel-like shapes in the distance. 'I'm almost there,' he thought to himself. There was nothing better right now to have a warm place to rest his aching wings, full his belly, and sooth his labido.

He groaned in annoyens as a gust of wind pushed him backwards. One might think that a dragon of his breed would be strong enough to handle such hostile enviroment, he begged to differ.

The drake had been traveling the last week, only stopping at local inns and caves to rest, but he had been otherwise flying non-stop. And he finally saw the fruit of his effort. It won't belong before he would find a nice hearth to lay next to and a warm cunt wraped over his cock.

The prospect made him smile, injecting a new supply of determenation into him, propelling his speed. Soon he landed on frozen earth. The cold, damp, snow serped into his skin, caussing him to shiver. He moved quickly to the cobbled road. Any surface would be warmer then snow. The doors od the great city stood wide open, inviting any weary traveler to enter; an invatation the drake happely excepted.

Like any thriving motropolise, Warfang was buzzeling with activity. The winter might have its iron grip around the valley, but that didn't stop the markets from opening for costumers. He moved passed dragons, moles, and other anthro -like creatures running from stalls to stalls.

His eyes darted from building, searching for a sign of an inn. At the end of the street, on the edge of the marketplace was a wooden board with the title "The Dragons' Lair". "Finally," he mutterd, speeding his pace to a trot.

The inn was full of song, laughter, and shouts. The heat wrapped around the drake like a cozy blanket. Moving passed tabels that seated spieces of all sorts, the drake couldn't help but feel uneasy. Eyes where staring at him, only to dart elswear when he looked at them. It was no surprize, really. He knew it was because of the color of his scales. Completely pitch black.

He took a seat on a bar-stool, ignoring the stares. The innkeeper appeard, looking at him as a sourch of income rather then a rare sight. He gave a friendly smile when the drake plopped five red gems on the counter. "The strongest stuff you have."

The innkeep dissapeared only to re-appear with a bottle of red ale. To most of the dragons and anthros surprize, he drank a full cup like it was just plaun juice. "More," he said, wipping his maw. 'Weak stuff,' the drake reflectedwhen he went for his second drink, not even getting him a little bit wozy.

"Your not from around here, are you?" a burly red dragon sitting next to him asked. "Nay," was the only thing the black drake responded with. The red dragon snorted. "Then whe're you from." There was silence for a moment, then the drake spoke,"Passed the moantians."

The red dragon seemed surprized. "Really? That's passed the border. A long way from home I see. So, whatsa doing way down here." The drake glanced left and right, then said,"I'll tell you if you can get me something to fuck." taken aback at the drakes sudden blutness, the red dragon said,"If you looking for something to rammed that poker up, i'm afraid you came to the wrong city. Whores are scarce here. But I know luckely where you can find good pussy."

He then gusterd to an vixen serving wench. She had tight large breasts and a good rump on her. Her face was pretty and young. "She might not be your specie, but shell do just fine." The drake nodded, then said,"I'm looking for someone." The red dragon cocked an eyebrow. "Who might that be?" The drake looked at him, his bright green eyes giving a slight ominous presence. "For a dragoness named Cynder. I believe she could be my sister."
1553.title: A lost brother.

info.brief_description: Spyro, Cynder and my OC, Iseras, must embark on a journey to get home.
info.description:
Spyro, his friend Iseras, and Cynder must embark on a journey of a lifetime. But even a simple journey can have some unexpected turns.

My rules:

The dragons can't be anthros.
Any type of vore except anal vore is allowed.
If you kill a main character, you must either bring them back to life or end the story.
Sex is allowed.
No short chapters--I will delete any short chapters.
No scat.
You can add another character if you want.
No resurrecting any characters already dead.

Other than that, read, add chapters, and enjoy!
info.pretty_title: The journeys of Spyro and Cynder
